name: Rainbow Dice Roller
description:
Rainbow Dice Roller is a 3D dice rolling simulator that lets you roll dice in a tray.  This program was a practice run for a more robust app down the road, once I model a fresh set of dice.

Consequently, the dice in this program came from:

Victorzzt at OpenGameArt.org under Creative Commons (CC-BY)

But for now, enjoy the app!  I'll be sure to post something new when I polish a full set in Blender.
